types.html:
moi vivant

  1. as long as I live, while I'm alive
    • 1908, Paul Bourget & André Cury, Un divorce : pièce en trois actes‎[1], Librairie Plon:
      N'espère pas son consentement à ce mariage. Moi vivant, tu ne l'auras jamais, jamais !
      Don't expect her consent to this marriage. So long as I live, you will never, ever get it!
trans: as long as I live, while I'm alive
as long as I live, while I'm alive
